::Dragonfly/7 Bat-probes/::

"GOod idea... we can leave the diplomacy's chat later and dot shoot 
at the bat-bots... They are allies" and screaming towards his 
followers "OK team...l time for tha fireworks... SHOOT!!!!"

Darkfate's bt-probes arrived and started to attack at Alliance-bots, 
and Dragonfly took off and started attack by air.
